scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace react-query-swagger tsc && yarn workspace pet-client-v3 tsc && yarn workspace pet-client tsc
scripts.generate-all: yarn generate-api-client-axios && yarn generate-api-client-axios-v3 && yarn generate-api-client-fetch && yarn generate-api-client-fetch-v3 && yarn typecheck
scripts.copy_from_v4: yarn copyfiles -u 2 -e "**/File.liquid" -e "**/AxiosClient.liquid" -e "**/FetchClient.liquid" src/templates/* src/templates_v3 && yarn replace "from '@tanstack/react-query';" "from 'react-query';" src/templates_v3/ReactQueryFile.liquid
